entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
